# Don't use ZIP files!
Instead, use text files with data URIs like this:
```
text.txt="""
data:text/plain;base64,
"""

main.py="""
data:text/x-python;base64,cHJpbnQoIkhlbGxvIFdvcmxkISEhIikNCmlucHV0KCJQcmVzcyBFbnRlciBUbyBFeGl0ISEhIik=
"""
```

To open them, you can copy the URI, paste them in your browser's address bar and bingo! The file appears!
Enjoy!!!
